rooms.description: Spacious living area integrated with eco-friendly materials and large windows for natural light.
Modern, energy-efficient kitchen with sustainable appliances and proper ventilation.
Open dining space adjacent to the living room, designed for gatherings.
Eco-friendly bedroom with a spacious balcony, ensuring privacy and natural ventilation.
Dedicated home theater designed for optimal acoustic performance with energy-efficient lighting.

openings.location: living_room, facing east to capture morning sunlight as per Vastu
